amendment.description: To allow permitting agencies to consider new circumstances and new information.

vote.text: Amendment SA 155 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 56. Record Vote Number: 46.

action.text: Amendment SA 155 proposed by Senator Booker to Amendment SA 2. (consideration: CR S525; text: CR S525) To allow permitting agencies to consider new circumstances and new information.
